## AppNotification interface

Represents an object with data required to display a notification

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AppNotification 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [details?](./notification.appnotification.details.md) | Maybe&lt;string&gt;\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Additional information displayed as a list of strings |
|  [duration?](./notification.appnotification.duration.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom duration that the notification will be displayed for |
|  [title?](./notification.appnotification.title.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A title on the notification snack bar |
|  [type](./notification.appnotification.type.md) | [NotificationType](./notification.notificationtype.md) | The type of notification which determines styling and duration |
